analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x8c20d8d54771df6ed6728ca7413ae95e2e5f14ee.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/10/0x8c20d8d54771df6ed6728ca7413ae95e2e5f14ee.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/10/0x8c20d8d54771df6ed6728ca7413ae95e2e5f14ee.sol#58-59) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of Garrys.weiToOwner (/unique_chucks/10/0x8c20d8d54771df6ed6728ca7413ae95e2e5f14ee.sol) is not in mixedCase
Garrys.GameContract (/unique_chucks/10/0x8c20d8d54771df6ed6728ca7413ae95e2e5f14ee.sol#89) is never used in Garrys
